${ModID}:ArsenalGear.NAME: Arsenal Gear
${ModID}:ArsenalGear.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the next !M! turns, add a random *Uncommon or *Rare to your hand. It costs 1 less this combat.

${ModID}:ConjureBarrage.NAME: Conjure Barrage
${ModID}:ConjureBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Magic *Missiles to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:ConjureBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Magic *Missiles+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MagicMissile.NAME: Magic Missile
${ModID}:MagicMissile.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage dealt by *Magic *Missiles by !M! this turn.

${ModID}:Channel.NAME: Channel
${ModID}:Channel.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Reduce the cost of a random card in hand by !M! this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Daggerstorm.NAME: Daggerstorm
${ModID}:Daggerstorm.DESCRIPTION: When you create a *non-Shiv card, create and play a *Shiv on a random target.

${ModID}:FlamingGrasp.NAME: Flaming Grasp
${ModID}:FlamingGrasp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, add a *Flame *Pillar to your hand.
${ModID}:FlamingGrasp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, add !M! *Flame *Pillars to your hand.

${ModID}:Haymaker.NAME: Haymaker
${ModID}:Haymaker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each card played this turn.

${ModID}:ManaShield.NAME: Mana Shield
${ModID}:ManaShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Channel to your hand.
${ModID}:ManaShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Channels to your hand.

${ModID}:MuscleMemory.NAME: Muscle Memory
${ModID}:MuscleMemory.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your draw pile. Add a copy of it to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:MuscleMemory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your draw pile. Add a copy of it to your hand. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to copy to your hand.

${ModID}:Crusher.NAME: Crusher
${ModID}:Crusher.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When a card is created, reduce *Crusher's cost by 1 until played.

${ModID}:PreservedThorns.NAME: Preserved Thorns
${ModID}:PreservedThorns.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Sting to your hand.
${ModID}:PreservedThorns.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Stings to your hand.

${ModID}:Sting.NAME: Sting
${ModID}:Sting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw an additional card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WallOfFire.NAME: Wall of Fire
${ModID}:WallOfFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Add 3 *Flame *Pillars to your hand.
${ModID}:WallOfFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Add 3 *Flame *Pillars+ to your hand.
